parameters.pct: a numeric vector denoting the grouping according to the mixtures percentages
parameters.dose: a numeric vector of dose values
parameters.rgr: a numeric vector of response values (relative growth rates)

reference:
The dataset is analysed in Soerensen et al (2007). 
The asymmetric Voelund model is appropriate, whereas the symmetric Hewlett model is not.
title: Mechlorprop and terbythylazine tested on Lemna minor
description:
Description
Data consist of 5 mixture, 6 dilutions, three replicates, and 12 common controls; in total 102 onservations.
format: A data frame with 102 observations on the following 3 variables.
